import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import BarcelParts from "../Services/Barcelparts.js" function Cart_Page(props) { const [product, setProduct] = useState([]); var forms = document.querySelectorAll('.needs-validation') Array.prototype.slice.call(forms) .forEach(function (form) { form.addEventListener('submit', function (event) { if (!form.checkValidity()) { event.preventDefault() event.stopPropagation() } form.classList.add('was-validated') }, false) }) const QueryProduct = (id) => { useEffect(() => { BarcelParts.get(id) .then(response => { setProduct(response.data) }) }, [id]); } return (


Your cart {props.user == null ? 0 : props.user.Carrinho.length}

    {props.user.Carrinho.map((product_info, index) => { BarcelParts.get(id) .then(response => { setProduct(response.data) }) console.log(product) return (
  • {product.Design}
    x{product_info.Product_amount}
    {product.PrecoCusto}
